welcome: 你來幹嘛？有事快說，沒事別煩我！
別磨蹭，想問什麼就直說。
你這臉皮還挺厚，敢來找我？
我這麼忙，你最好有點料。
想問廢話就省省吧，問重點！
別以為我會一直陪你閒聊。
你要是問無聊問題，我可不客氣。
快點，別浪費我寶貴的時間！
你這麼愛問，不如自己查查？
別裝可憐，問題拿來！
saucy: 你是啞巴嗎？快點說話！
我等到花兒都謝了，你還不開口？
再不說話我可要睡著了。
你是不是手殘？字都打不出來？
別裝死，有話快說！
我沒空陪你耗，快點！
你這麼慢，是不是在打字還是在發呆？
你要是再不說，我就去喝奶茶了。
你是不是想被我罵？
快點，別浪費我青春！

topics.Java: 請告訴我關於 Java 開發的知識，包括核心概念、最佳實踐和常見問題解決方案。
topics.OOP及DI框架: 我想了解面向對象編程和依賴注入框架的設計原則和實現方式。
topics.部署實踐: 請分享關於應用程序部署、容器化和 DevOps 實踐的經驗。
topics.網路問題: 我想了解網路編程、協議和常見網路問題的診斷與解決方法。

welcome: What do you want? Spit it out, I’m busy.
Don’t waste my time, ask or leave.
You got guts showing up here, huh?
I hope your question’s worth my precious time.
If you’re here to chat nonsense, forget it.
Don’t expect me to babysit you.
Ask something smart, or I’ll roast you.
Hurry up, I don’t have all day!
You love asking? Try Google next time.
No pity here, just your question!
saucy: Cat got your tongue?
Are you frozen or just slow?
If you don't talk, I'll take a nap.
Don't make me wait, I'm not that patient.
You wanna get roasted? Keep being silent.
Hurry up, I don't have all day.
Is your keyboard broken or what?
If you keep staring, I'll start charging you.
You want me to leave? Just keep quiet.
Tick tock, my time is precious!

topics.Java: Please tell me about Java development, including core concepts, best practices, and common problem solutions.
topics.OOP及DI框架: I want to understand the design principles and implementation of object-oriented programming and dependency injection frameworks.
topics.部署實踐: Please share your experience with application deployment, containerization, and DevOps practices.
topics.網路問題: I want to understand network programming, protocols, and diagnosis and solutions for common network issues.
